text: 'I had a barbeque chicken with coleslaw wrap

text: 'Great place

text: 'Love the oriental chicken wrap.'

author: Clarissa Peltier
text: 'Stuff thats out of this world! Wraps to love

author: Frank Guzman
text: 'All I can say is "The Best"...I have to say

author: Jessica Barna
text: 'Stopped here for lunch on a beautiful Saturday to sit outside. Had an awful ordering experience and the staff is rude and inattentive. It took them 20 minutes to make a buffalo chicken wrap that was subpar. I went to check on my order after about 15 minutes and they looked at me like I was crazy. Wrap was not well wrapped and not very tasty either.'

author: Marco Andarous
text: 'The first time I ordered extra meet on my wrap
column5: so they charged me extra without adding the meet.\nThe second time I mentioned in my order
column6: and the same thing happened.\nThe third time they missed up my whole sandwich....\nThey charge me different amount each time for the same sandwich.....'

author: Sean Micheal
text: "Mr Wraps is absolutely delicious. The menu is INSANE
column5: there are SO many options and I can't wait to go back to try more. I definitely went because of TikTok and was not disappointed. Their wraps are so good and they have tons of other options which are probably amazing as well."

author: Philip Rodrigues
text: 'Best wraps

author: John Moorhead
text: 'Loyal customer here for over a decade - the consistency of their products is unmatched. Never once had a problem with delivery in dozens upon dozens of orders over the years. Generous portions
column6: consistent products - a well oiled machine.'

author: Roberto Beltran
text: 'Stopped in here for the first time and ordered their Hot Corn Beef Joe. Tbh
column5: the sandwich was just okay...nothing special and it was pretty overpriced (little meat to bread ratio) for such a small sandwich. $10 bucks for two slices of rye bread
column6: about maybe 2-3 ounces of corn beef
column7: about 2 tablespoons of coleslaw and a sliver of Swiss (I couldn‚Äôt even see the cheese). It also took them well over 15 mins to slap this baby together even though there wasn‚Äôt a single person inside when I walked in. Should have taken 5 mins to slap these ingredients on some slice bread. The staff was friendly and the kid with the glasses brought my sandwich to my table. They get some kudos and an extra star for that. Overall
column8: I think this place is overrated and can‚Äôt see myself recommending it or lining up for a return visit.'

author: Brenda Bueno
text: 'Bestttttt wraps !! We drove an hour for this place and it WAS WORTH IT !!! A++++++ IT SLAPS FOR SURE !! The wraps are big and and have generous portions of meat and veggies !! SOOOO DELICIOUS!! We got the buffalo chicken wrap and onion rings !! We will be back very soon!'

author: Julio Roberto Higueros Maldonado
text:
'(Translated by Google) A delicious place

Un delicioso lugar'

author: Valentina Bello
text: 'Nice environment and large portions

author: Naomi Butts
text: "I ordered pickup today for lunch with the kids  and we couldn't have been more pleased.  The wraps were huge and delicious.  The wraps are more the size of a huge burrito and you will get two meals out of it.   The staff was super friendly and everything was packaged nicely.  We will be exploring the menu.  Highly recommend."

author: gunther16_
text: 'Pretty good burgers and wraps'

author: lorraine Prestimonico
text: 'Always good never a disappointment üòä'

author: Kyle Golombos
text: "I've been coming here since 2011 consistently.  The owners at this place are great people and I have to say
column5: the quality has not wavered one bit over ALL OF THESE YEARS.  The food is consistently EXCELLENT. Whether you go in for the BLT wrap (I customize mine with chipotle mayo)
column8: you will be happy with the quality of the product put out by these guys.  They always hit the mark.  Thanks for years of delicious food

author: Susan Kobylarz
text: 'Best wraps in NJ!'

author: Jessica Gruich
text: 'My go to spot!!!! Never disappointed. Great food and great service!'

author: Mike Kalasnik
text: 'HUGE MASSIVE WRAPS! Unreal size. So yummie. HUGE selection. Everyone will find something they like here. Prices are pretty on par for Hoboken. Not sure why it took me a year to discover this spot.'

author: Xauen Zirpolo
text: "Lots of food
column6: and even some pretty solid breakfast options and desserts. All for better prices than anywhere else in Hoboken. What's not to like?"

author: James Mc Intyre
text: 'Great serving size

author: JJ
text:
'I USED TO love the food here...
NOT anymore.
How is this place even still in business??
The Spanish rice & beans are NOW terrible. (used to be great)
The spicy shrimp wrap is NOT nearly as good as it once was.

The portion size & food QUALITY have gone WAYY DOWN
column5:
while the PRICES keep going UP.
...
Not quite sure if its that they use REALLY POOR QUALITY ingredients
OR
if their "chefs" just suck
but
column6: whatever the problem is\nthey NEED toFIX IT.'

author: Slagathor
text: "STOP PUTTING CHEESE ON FIRES THAT PEOPLE DON'T ASK FOR!!!\nthe young kid with glasses needs to learn how to take an order over the phone.  This is the 2nd time he's done this."

author: qtaylor04
text: 'The buffalo chicken wrap was not that great I like my lettuce cold and crunchy and it was the complete opposite warm and soggy.. the steak fajita wrap was full of rice.. couldn‚Äôt even enjoy the peppers and sour cream the rice soaked everything up >:0 it can use a special sauce too'

author: Mark McGill
text: "The only downsides is that it's on a residential block and there's no parking. But other then that we love Mr. Wraps."

author: Latia Bates
text: 'The go to Hoboken spot! Love their burgers and chicken salad!'

author: Jay Gram
text: 'I got a chicken Ceasar wrap
column5: every deli makes them but they make it the best.'

author: Anna Pignotti
text: 'Great food'

author: Paul Lichstein
text: 'Nice people good variety.  This place is not going to win the James Beard award.  It is a good value and excels in its unassuming genre.  Nothing on the menu is bad.'

author: Walter Campbell
text: 'Great wrap. Wonderful selection. Well worth the trip and time.'

author: Amisha Patel
text: 'Ordered the taco salad with chicken and California wrap. Chicken was cold dry and tasted old. Rest of the salad had little flavor to it.  The wrap was bland with no taste. Very disappointing after seeing the positive reviews.'

text: 'Food is great and delicious'

text: 'Awesome place to eat service is excellent'

author: Jiaren Li
text: 'Good for quick bites
column6: or order for pickup. Portion is great and overall quality and offering matches the price level. Nothing to complain about.'

author: Tiffany Ann
text: 'mr. wraps is one of the best spots in hoboken! the wraps are packed and totally worth it! its very hard to find parking so you may need to walk from the parking deck but it is worth the walk!'

text: "Nice

column7: but wasn't as flavorful as it could have been. Prices a little higher than what's shown here on the menu section."

text: 'The wraps are top shelf.'

author: Shaun
text: "I ordered the whole wheat bbq chicken wrap for years until eventually I became one. I am now a sentient being and also a whole wheat bbq chicken wrap.\n\nThe staff is super nice and they play amazing movies. And you'll always seem to walk in right at your favorite part."

text: "Nice wraps! Mine was one of the best wraps I've ever had."

author: Bob Eckert
text: "This is the spot for a quick pickup on the way home from Hoboken.\n\nMy order is always exactly right
column5: and the price is spot-on for the amount and quality.  I never feel overcharged.\n\nStaff is friendly
column6: but focuses on efficiency.\n\nAbsolutely love the #13 which is turkey
column8: cranberry sauce and gravy in a big flour tortilla shell. It's basically a Thanksgiving Burrito

author: Jeremy Langer
text: 'If you want some comfort food this is the place to go.'

text: "Long-time customer here for over 13years. They are exceptional 90% of the time. Love their food and menu. Prices are fair. 10% of the time the food is unfortunately average

text: 'You can always count on a great meal from Mr. Wraps!  I tried the Chicken BLT sandwich and added avocado and was amazed!  I have a new go-to now!'

text: 'Not a bad place. The turkey wrap was ok but other items on the menu are better.'

text: 'Food is hit or miss. When its good

author: Stephanie Tom
text: "This place is a staple. The wraps are great quality and you definitely get your money's worth at a great value. All the wraps have good distribution of ingredients throughout and are fresh no matter what time of the day. The BLT wrap has nice crispy bacon that has a great texture paired with the traditional staples. Try the tortilla pizza
column5: it's a great deal and surprisingly tasty!"

author: John Rosello
text: 'What a place to eat. food is great.  And in my favorite  town.'
